item.title: C - How to handle time (time_t)
item.description: How to handle time in C language (time_t) #include <stdio.h>#include <time.h> int main() { char buf[20]; # get current time time_t now = time(NULL); # print as number (epoch time) printf("%ld\n", now); // 1632404344 strftime(buf, 20, "%Y-%m-%d", localtime(&now)); printf("%s\n", buf); // 2021-09-23 return 0; }
